definitions.text: the cloak as a symbol of authority
examples: place the mantle of authority on younger shoulders

definitions.text: the layer of the earth between the crust and the core

examples: there was a blanket of snow

definitions.text: (zoology) a protective layer of epidermis in mollusks or brachiopods that secretes a substance forming the shell
shelf that projects from wall above fireplace
examples: in Britain they call a mantel a chimneypiece

definitions.text: hanging cloth used as a blind (especially for a window)
a sleeveless garment like a cloak but shorter
spread over a surface, like a mantle
